description: Max Johnston completes his move to Sturm Graz from Motherwell, signing a four-year contract with Austrian Bundesliga club.
title: Max Johnston: Sturm Graz complete right-back signing on four-year deal after Motherwell exit
title_page: Max Johnston: Sturm Graz complete right-back signing on four-year deal after Motherwell exit - BBC Sport
maintext:
Max Johnston has completed his move to Sturm Graz from Motherwell, signing a four-year contract with the Austrian Bundesliga club.
The 19-year-old right-back ended the season as a regular starter with the Scottish Premiership outfit but rejected the offer of a new deal.
Motherwell will be due a compensation fee of around Â£300,000.
Sturm managing director Andreas Schicker said he "has already proven in Scotland what great qualities he has".
